page.title: 07Aberdare By_Pass System
page.content: When we asked the same person "Could you estimate how many vehicles pass your home in one hour?"We were surprised,he told us that 40_50 vehicles pass his house in one hour. We asked "Have any official complaints been made about the noise?" He said not to his knowledge but complaints have been made about the roads' surface roughness. A traffic census of the main roundabout of the by_pass showed 451 vehicles pass in 30 minutes. This indicates that the main Gadlys Road is used less now than before. Although this by_pass has caused a lot of controversey the general opinion is that it is an asset to the community as a whole.
